root.data: Mental disorders occur in all regions and cultures of the world. The most common of these disorders are depression and anxiety, estimated to affect 1 out of 10 people. At worst, depression can lead to suicide. In 2012, there were an estimated 800,000 suicide deaths worldwide. Suicide is the second leading cause of death among young people aged 15-29, after road traffic accidents. Therefore, this is an important indicator to assess the state of mental disorders in modern society.
